1713205818.0644906.sceneDescription: In this video segment, the person is opening the lid of a coffee bean grinder, likely to check the level or type of beans before grinding them for coffee. It appears that they are preparing to make a fresh cup of coffee using the equipment in a kitchen or a break room.

1713205829.0059636.sceneDescription: A person is operating an espresso machine, first by removing a portafilter from a holder, then grinding coffee into it, leveling the grounds, and finally placing it back into the espresso machine. The individual appears to be preparing to brew an espresso shot.

1713205843.4557507.sceneDescription: In this segment of the video, coffee beans are being ground, and a shot of espresso is being prepared using an espresso machine. The individual appears to be a barista performing the steps of dosing, grinding, and tamping the coffee in preparation for brewing espresso.

1713205894.4044065.sceneDescription: In this sequence of images, a person is preparing an espresso shot by grinding coffee beans into a portafilter, then leveling and tamping the grounds to ensure even extraction. The individual appears to be following the steps required to make a properly extracted shot of espresso using a semi-automatic espresso machine and grinder.

1713205916.406309.sceneDescription: In this sequence of images, a person is grinding coffee beans, tamping the grounds into an espresso portafilter, and preparing an espresso machine for brewing. The process involves using a grinder to produce fresh grounds, distributing and compressing them with a tamper, and then attaching the portafilter to the espresso machine to make a shot of espresso.

1713205929.6383471.sceneDescription: A person is operating an espresso machine and inserting a portafilter into the group head. The digital display on the machine shows the time, indicating that this segment captures the person preparing to brew espresso.

1713205944.1738849.sceneDescription: A person is preparing a paper cup for espresso, sequentially taking a single cup from a stack, attaching a portafilter to an espresso machine, and starting the shot. The espresso machine is brewing coffee into the cup held below the portafilter spout.

1713205956.2550342.sceneDescription: In this sequence of images, a person is operating a commercial espresso machine to pull a shot of espresso into a takeaway paper cup. The person adjusts the settings and uses the machine's lever to start and stop the extraction process.

1713205972.158219.sceneDescription: A cup is being filled with espresso from a coffee machine over a period of about seven seconds. The digital display reflects the decrease in temperature as the espresso is being poured.

1713205985.4276977.sceneDescription: A person is making a cup of coffee using an espresso machine, initially pressing a button and then pulling down a lever to dispense the espresso into the cup. During the process, the display shows the elapsed time in seconds since the button was pressed.

1713206004.979304.sceneDescription: In this segment of the video, someone is using an espresso machine to make a shot of coffee. The individual operates the machine, places a cup under the spout, and a shot of espresso is dispensed into the cup.

1713206022.601458.sceneDescription: In this segment of the video, the person is operating an espresso machine, inserting and locking the portafilter (where ground coffee is held), brewing espresso, and then knocking out the used coffee grounds into a knock box (the black container for discarding espresso pucks). After that, they head toward the sink, possibly to rinse the portafilter.

1713206037.652741.sceneDescription: The person is using a handheld shower head to clean something in the sink, and in the last frame, they turn to look at notices or information posted on the wall to their right. The sequence of images captures a moment of cleaning or rinsing, followed by a brief pause or distraction as they glance at the posted materials.

1713206052.5742016.sceneDescription: In this sequence of images, someone is pulling a continuous sheet of paper towel from a dispenser, then wrapping and pressing it into a coffee portafilter, presumably to dry the inside of the basket. The person appears to be preparing the equipment for making espresso, as part of the regular maintenance or cleaning process required before brewing.

1713206070.1377869.sceneDescription: In this video segment, a person is operating an espresso machine: they are inserting and then removing a portafilter from a grinder to fill it with ground coffee, tamping the grounds, attaching the portafilter to the espresso machine, and then starting the machine to brew a shot of espresso. The sequence demonstrates the steps taken to prepare a fresh espresso, from grinding the beans to the final pour into a cup.

1713206085.3973696.sceneDescription: In this segment of the video, the person is walking through what appears to be a break room or cafeteria, disposing of a paper cup and some napkins into a trash bin and then returning to a table where there is food, including pizza. The individual seems to be cleaning up after having a meal or a coffee break.

1713206100.3739657.sceneDescription: In this segment of the video, a person is sitting down at a table with food, and over the duration of four seconds, they reach for and take a napkin from the pile on the table. There is no significant change in the surroundings or the arrangement of the food on the table.
